author: dennisl
msg: [MCHECKSTYLE-192] Properties files are only processed in the report, but not in the mojo

author: oheger
msg: [CONFIGURATION-546] BeanHelper can now deal with properties of type Collection if the passed in BeanDeclaration is populated correctly.
There is no framework support so far for creating such BeanDeclarations, but
if they are created manually by client code, they are processed successfully
by BeanHelper. Thanks to Justin Couch for the patch.
